text: William Robert "Bob" Boyd (June 7, 1930 - January 14, 2015) was an American former collegiate man's basketball coach. He was head coach at Seattle University, the University of Southern California (USC) and Mississippi State University.Lon Eubanks. "Even Now, Bob Boyd Isn't Retiring Type". Los Angeles Times. April 25, 1998. Retrieved on August 9, 2010. Boyd died of natural causes in Palm Desert, California, aged 84. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in California Category:Sportspeople from California
title: Bob Boyd (basketball)
